item.title: Github edits thread
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Patrick noted:

This one is prominent since it can be opened from start menu. Not sure how many people are reading it though.

https://github.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/blob/master/etc/tor/torrc.examples

Also https://github.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/blob/master/etc/tor/torrc.anondist - exception this one only: but we cannot merge it soon. We might merge it for Whonix 15 when we include anon-connection-wizard by default.

Do you think people would look into https://github.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/blob/master/usr/share/tor/tor-service-defaults-torrc.anondist?

Btw don’t bother updating Copyright © 2012 - 2014 (etc.). No need. If you think I should higher priority to update it, I could do an easy mass search and replace so little manual labor would be used for this.

The generic readme. https://github.com/Whonix/whonix-developer-meta-files/blob/master/README_generic.md - very prominent - because it gets used on any github repository. https://github.com/Whonix/sdwdate-gui, https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix, https://github.com/Whonix/onion-grater etc. everywhere.

Btw please don’t edit the upper part of github readmes. To change that content, that goes to debian/control such as for example https://github.com/Whonix/sdwdate-gui/blob/master/debian/control. From there, README.md is sometimes auto generated. 80 characters per line maximum. I am not sure how many people read package descriptions besides reviewers. Would be more important if any Whonix packages made it into packages.debian.org.

VirtualBox import message:

gateway https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/blob/master/build-steps.d/2700_export-vbox-vm#L24
workstation https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/blob/master/build-steps.d/2700_export-vbox-vm#L50
custom workstation https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/blob/master/build-steps.d/2700_export-vbox-vm#L77

Read full topic

item.title: Github edits thread
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Needed edits:

github.com

Whonix/sdwdate/blob/master/usr/share/translations/sdwdate.yaml

sdwdate:
    en:
        fetching: 'Time fetching in progress...'
        restricted: 'Initial time fetching in progress...'
        user_kill: 'Signal SIGTERM received. sdwdate stopped by user or system. '
        sleeping: 'Sleeping for '
        minutes: ' minutes.'
        success: 'Success.'

        no_valid_time: 'Time is not set:<b> no valid time returned from pool </b><br>
                        Possible causes:<br>- internet connection is down
                        <br>- Tor is not running'
        no_value_returned: '<b>No values returned from servers.</b>'
        list_not_built: '<b>Something is wrong. sdwdate could not build a list or urls.</b>'
        restart: '<br> Restart sdwdate. If the problem persists, please report this bug.<br>'

        general_proxy_error: '<b>General Proxy Error.</b> Is Tor running?'
        general_timeout_error: '<b>General Timeout Error.</b> Internet connection might be down.'

        max_pool_failures_1: '<b>Maximum allowed number of failures</b> reached in pool '
This file has been truncated. show original

Read full topic
